rows.label: tlk00040102_msg0001
rows.name:
Did you hear what Chairman Bahn had to say, Mo-mo?
If so, get to work quickly, mo.

rows.label: tlk00040102_msg0002
rows.name:
With the money you got from Chairman Bahn,
you should be able to get some good equipment, mo.

rows.label: tlk00040102_msg0003
rows.name:
Once you're ready, head to the Goldmund
Exit Dock, mo. I've prepared an amazing
ship for you, mo.
